ingredients: +   1/4 cup soy sauce, 3  green onions, thinly sliced, 1 tablespoon black sesame oil, 1 tablespoon rice vinegar, 1 teaspoon grated ginger,   +   1/2 teaspoon garlic, minced, 12 ounces smoked salmon, chopped, 2 cups cooked brown rice,   +   1/4 cup diced mango,   +   1/4 cup diced cucumber,   +   1/4 cup diced avocado,   +   1/4 cup sliced fresh strawberries, 1 teaspoon black sesame seeds, or to taste
nutrition: Total Fat 10g 13%, Saturated Fat 2g 9%, Cholesterol 20mg 7%, Sodium 1576mg 69%, Total Carbohydrate 29g 10%, Dietary Fiber 3g 12%, Total Sugars 3g, Protein 20g, Vitamin C 12mg 62%, Calcium 44mg 3%, Iron 2mg 10%, Potassium 355mg 8%
